comments: Wasn\'t sure what to expect with this class, but Melanie is a very engaging instructor and her enthusiasm for this class topic is infectious. Really made me think "out of the box" in my business.

I had no interest in the class because it was a mostly theory but she made it so much fun. She was interesting, she had so many icebreakers and fun activities it was a different way of learning. I would recommend anyone to take a class with her.
Very enthusiastic and witty - made learning content fun

She was into creativity in writing and presentations. She cared about the students and assignments were managable. Largest project was a 10 pg paper in proper format. I would take another class from this instructor.
